website_summaries.verdict: These shoes offer classic looks and lace up style that is suitable for both casual and semi-dressy wear, but they aren't the best on slick or wet surfaces.
pros: Not only are they comfortable, but this handsome pair of shoes offers classic styling that's the perfect look for summer
Goes nicely with jeans, khakis, or dress pants
cons: They run narrow, so you may have to order a size larger than you normally wear

customer_reviews.title: and they felt like they were cutting into my feet
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never owned Toms before. When I first purchased them, I really regretted it - they were so tight that I had a fight to get them on, and they felt like they were cutting into my feet. I nearly returned them. A quick google, however, suggested keeping them on for an hour. And in that space of an hour, a miracle occurred - they fit beautifully. Very, very comfortable - I had two days walking around London all day in them, non-stop. No rubbing, no pain. Brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: LeglessLegoLegolas

customer_reviews.title: wear them with socks for a short while for a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Knowing that Toms are a small fit, I ordered 6.5 instead of a 6. When they arrived they looked tiny. I squeezed my feet into them and tried wearing them around the house for a bit. They bit into my heels and started to hurt. I put a pair of medium thick socks on and literally forced my feet into them and wore them like that for around 1/2 an hour. I then took my socks off and the shoes fit perfectly. They are now super comfy and I love them. TLDR - wear socks with them for 1/2 hour and they will then fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Looking good
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé has had Toms throughout the five years we’ve been together, she swears by them. This pair, as with all that’s owned start a little tight before they’re broken in. She’s a 5.5, so this is what I ordered, and they are slightly right to get on. In a couple of weeks they’ll stretch and shape to her feet and be the most comfortable shoes she’s ever worn. Well recommended in terms of style. This deep red colour goes well with jeans and a variety of styles, and work equally well for popping out into town or wearing round the house as an alternative to slippers. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Carl West

customer_reviews.title: Great, but order a size up
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, good quality and look just like the picture. Only too small. I ordered a size 4 which I normally do have but could not even get my foot in the shoe. Will be returning these. Not sure how these are too small as I have a pair of size 4 Tom's already and they fit loosely... Update: Have ordered a size 5. They are still tight at the middle of the foot, but these do fit. Looking forward to wearing these as they look amazing, good quality and look smart.
customer_reviews.author: Ineke

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected fast postage
customer_reviews.text: Toms do fit on the smaller side this is my third pair now. My last paid I got at a boot sale and my pair before that I paid £44. This paid set me back £28 and we’re exactly as described and arrived very quickly. I knew what size I was having ordered them before and they’re always a bit tighter tbstart with and the slacken Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Bethhol17

customer_reviews.title: Started to fall apart after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: While they fit good and are indeed comfortable to wear, they started to fall apart after two months of normal (i.e, a few days a week) use. Rather disappointed since I didn't expect the quality to be so bad. Most likely would not buy again since it's a waste of money and the environment.
customer_reviews.author: mv

customer_reviews.title: Do not order this shoe. The sizes are compleately wrong and the fabric is too rough.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality service. I ordered a size 4.5 even if I am size 4 and when I got the shoe they been far too small and narrow. I requested to return them, but the seller is asking me to pay the postage. I found it very unfair as I consider it is not my fault that the seller advertise wrong sizes. Also the quality of the shoe it is not great. Very rough comparing with the other ones that I bought before from a different seller. Not recommanded.
customer_reviews.author: P.C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I mean, what can you say- you buy a TOMS, someone out there who needs one gets a pair as well. I have 3 pairs of TOMS- the classic design and I love them all. I am now aiming to own a pair with a more girlie design. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: SKYE

customer_reviews.title: Order bigger sizes than you are
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size bigger I could not get them on They are lovely I am not happy to have paid 10-95 to send back The courier was not convient so had to pay the price
customer_reviews.author: glynis

customer_reviews.title: super light shoe but for very narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: shame they come up super narrow. Very light and sturdy shoe. But had to send them back as they are extremely narrow.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding service, regular updates on item's dispatchanddelivery. Comfortable and unique product. Good price. Very pleased

customer_reviews.title: Shoes a small
customer_reviews.text: Brought in a larger size as reviews said they came up small, still very tight.

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: Theses are the 2nd pair I have bought. And they are so comfortable. I use them for jive dancing. Had the last pair for over 2yrs they were that good to dance in I wanted to buy the exact Same pair. I tested my new TOMS out 2weeks ago at a dance weekender and they did me proud, when theses are are we well worn out I will be buying another a pair :)

customer_reviews.title: Great fit as usual
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Toms in the past and find that if I go half a size up, they fit perfectly. These are no exception with the added bonus of wonderful rose gold polka dots. Love them.

customer_reviews.text: These were to be my 3rd pair of Toms in 2 years but sadly the size I normally wear are now about 2 sizes smaller than they used to be, measured sole to sole the new ones were much smaller.

customer_reviews.title: Toms Women's Classics Sneakers black
customer_reviews.text: I tried the same model in a high street shop, UK site 6 (US 8) and then ordered them online, as cheaper. They fit exactly the same and are perfect. So far, they seems very comfy and I love them :)

customer_reviews.title: Very smart and comfy

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, I've had several pairs now that I wear every day for work. They last quite a while and are really comfortable, really good for the price. Will definitely keep buying them in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they are so comfy. Wore them everyday whilst on holiday, they don't slip off - which I was worrying about as I can't normally wear 'slip on' footwear.

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of Toms and I'm already in love with th brand. The shoes are super comfortable, although the sole is a bit slippery. They arrived a couple of days earlier than expected and they seem to be holding on well after 2 months of use. Totally recommended.

customer_reviews.text: Came when expected but I received the wrong colour. I order the black and received grey which wouldn't usually bother me, but as they were for work I needed black. Look very good and comfy, didn't try them on as I am in the process of sending them back for a black pair.

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmmmh Sizing?
customer_reviews.text: The service was good arrived on time as promised. Really let down when I tried them on.... I am a size 5 these felt like a small 4 so unfortunately I am returning them. I will not bother to order size up. I have bought a really nice pair from a well known high street store. Size 5 and they fit perfectly..... also half the price. Surely I cant be the only one to have this problem with sizing of these espadrilles!
customer_reviews.author: K for K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent canvas shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I wondered at first if these canvas shoes were overpriced but I bought them anyway, based on the positive reviews I'd read. I wasn't disappointed. the material used for the upper and the sole is obviously very tough and hardwearing. The fit is very comfortable due to the design of the inner sole and the canvas fabric. Easily the best casual holiday/beach shoes I've ever had and well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Pippin Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, unfortunately way to tight. I'm a Size 5 narrow footed.Went into Schuh and tried a Size six on as I didn't want to send them back and order a larger size for them not to fit. Glad I did this as they were too big, gaping at the sides. The lady advised me to wear the size 5s round the house to break them in. I tried this but my tootsies were crippled, had to force them on. So had to send them back sadly and get a refund. Disappointed as I've herd lots of people say there great, long lasting and very comfortable.
